t: art
s: D. von Bother in his book Amazons in Greek Art provides a detailed catalogue of every known occurrence of Amazons in art. In her article Ancient Amazons - Heroes, Outsiders or Women?, Lorna Hardwick summarizes the art produced in the Attic Black Figure and Attic Red Figure periods.
